xml.script:
sync #!/bin/bash set -e
echo "ensure we're using the latest repo.conf" repodir="/etc/yum.repos.d" mv $repodir/%{name}.repo $repodir/%{name}.repo.bak 2>/dev/null || \ true #ignore missing curl -s -o $repodir/%{name}.repo %{os-url}/repo.conf rm -f $repodir/%{name}.repo.bak
echo "echo: run yum command(s), checking output for scriptlet failed errors" # determine whether sync plugin is installed on this system if [[ -f /usr/lib/yum-plugins/sync.py ]] ; then commands="yum sync -y" else commands="yum groupinstall core -y, yum update -y" fi
OLDIFS=$IFS IFS=',' for command in $commands; do IFS=$OLDIFS output=`$command` while read -r line do echo $line if [[ $line == *"scriptlet failed"* ]]; then failed="$failed `echo $line | sed -n '/^[^(]*(\([^)]*\)).*/s//\1/p'`" fi done < <(echo "$output") done
if [[ ${#failed} > 0 ]]; then yum erase $failed -q -y --cacheonly --disableplugin sync echo -e " ERROR: Scriptlet failed errors ocurred installing the following packages:\n ${failed#"${failed%%[![:space:]]*}"}\n See YUM output above for scriptlet failed errors. The failed packages have been uninstalled to prevent system inconsistencies. See the Deploy User Manual for information on 'Troubleshooting RPM scriptlet failed errors'." >&2 exit 1 fi
